QuoteText: Interesting. What do the you guys think of this? I, for one, agree 100%, but what does everyone else here think?
ResponseText: I'd guess I'd be able to take him more seriously if his own personal actions in the last few years backed up his statements.
I think he's correct in many ways but few with power care what he says.

My fifth and final lesson is that these institutions must be organized in a just and democratic manner that gives the poor and the weak some influence over the actions of the rich and the strong." What would be the purpose of empowering the poor and the weak to influence the actions of the rich and the strong? I can agree that it is reasonable to expect the rich and strong to raise the conditions of the weak and poor. But, they can not be allowed influence to bring the rich and strong down. What good there is in life flows from the rich and the strong. Koffi surely agrees with me on this, else why would the food for oil event have been tolerated?
